sense.gloss: sensei, title or form of address for a teacher, master, doctor, lawyer, etc.
intimate or teasing form of address
born in (country, month, imperial era, zodiac year, etc.)
situation in which a group of stones cannot be captured because it contains two or more gaps
natural, as it is, unedited, unprocessed
unpasteurized beer, draft beer, draught beer
just a little, somehow, vaguely, partially, somewhat, half-, semi-
occurrence, incidence, outbreak, birth (e.g. of civilization)
to make a living, to subsist
to be in effect, to be in use, to function
to come to life, to be enlivened
to be safe (in baseball, go, etc.)
restoration to life, coming to life again, resuscitation, regeneration
playback, regeneration (of video or sound), views (of an online video)
regeneration (of lost or damage tissue), regrowth
elementary school student, primary school student, grade school student
very hard, with utmost effort, as hard as one can, with all one's might, for dear life, eagerly, desperately
whole life, a lifetime, all through life, one existence, a generation, an age, the whole world, the era
(the only, the greatest, etc.) of one's life
for life, all one's life, throughout one's life, as long as one lives
way of life, how to live
junior high school student, middle school pupil
to produce, to yield, to cause
to result from, to arise, to be generated
to create, to bring forth, to produce
to invent, to think up and bring into being
to give birth to, to bear
living thing, living creature, animal, life
to exist, to live, to survive
inherent quality, one's true character, one's true colours
wild, growing wild, living in the wild
ecology, life and habits (of an animal)
mode of life, way of living
to give birth, to bear (child), to lay (eggs)
to produce, to yield, to give rise to, to deliver
to make (the best) use of, to put to good use, to leverage (skills, attributes, experience, etc.), to capitalise on (experience, etc.)
to let live, to keep alive
to revive, to resuscitate, to bring back to life
to restore (a deleted passage; in proofreading)
in a lively way, vividly, freshly, animatedly, actively, energetically

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑６月↑↓ろくがつ↓↑１８↑↓じゅうはち↓↑日↑↓にち↓で、ムーリエルの↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓です！
sdata.e: Today is June 18th and it is Muiriel's birthday!

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はそんな↑風↑↓ふう↓には↑生↑↓い↓きられない。
sdata.e: I can't live that kind of life.

sdata.j: ↑生物↑↓せいぶつ↓↑学↑↓がく↓は↑好↑↓す↓きになれません。
sdata.e: I never liked biology.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑生物↑↓せいぶつ↓↑学↑↓がく↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑好↑↓す↓きではありませんでした。
sdata.e: I never liked biology.

sdata.j: ↑高校生↑↓こうこうせい↓の↑時↑↓とき↓は↑毎朝↑↓まいあさ↓6↑時↑↓じ↓に↑起↑↓お↓きていた。
sdata.e: Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.

sdata.j: ↑人間↑↓にんげん↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑永遠↑↓えいえん↓には↑生↑↓い↓きられないものだ。
sdata.e: Humans were never meant to live forever.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑君↑↓きみ↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑住↑↓す↓んだことは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓↑観↑↓かん↓に↑影響↑↓えいきょう↓を↑与↑↓あた↓えたと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think my living with you has influenced your way of living.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はただ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑問題↑↓もんだい↓から↑逃↑↓に↓げているだけだよ。
sdata.e: You're just running away from life's problems.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑物理↑↓ぶつり↓の↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓をサボっても↑気↑↓き↓にしない。
sdata.e: My physics teacher doesn't care if I skip classes.

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓は↑甘↑↓あま↓くないけど↑僕↑↓ぼく↓はもっとつよい。
sdata.e: Life is hard, but I am harder.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓↑無↑↓な↓しに↑生↑↓い↓きる↑術↑↓じゅつ↓を↑学↑↓まな↓んだ。
sdata.e: I learned to live without her.

sdata.j: もっと↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑気↑↓き↓にかけられればいいのだけれど、でも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓のある↑点↑↓てん↓において↑成績↑↓せいせき↓はそんなに↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓ではないと↑分↑↓わ↓かったんだ。
sdata.e: I wish I could care more about my grades but it seems that, at a certain point of my life, I decided they wouldn't be so important anymore.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑兄弟↑↓きょうだい↓として↑共↑↓とも↓に↑生↑↓い↓きることを↑知↑↓し↓らなければならない。さもなくば、↑愚↑↓おろ↓か↑者↑↓もの↓として↑共↑↓とも↓に↑滅↑↓ほろ↓びるであろう。
sdata.e: We must learn to live together as brothers, or we will perish together as fools.

sdata.j: 「↑以前↑↓いぜん↓にどこかで↑会↑↓あ↓ったことがありませんか」とその↑学生↑↓がくせい↓はたずねた。
sdata.e: Haven't we met somewhere before? asked the student.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑生↑↓い↓きているうちに↑共産↑↓きょうさん↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓が↑効力↑↓こうりょく↓を↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑無↑↓な↓いだろう。
sdata.e: Communism will never be reached in my lifetime.

sdata.j: ９０↑歳↑↓さい↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓↑生↑↓い↓きることは↑決↑↓けっ↓してまれではない。
sdata.e: It is not rare at all to live over ninety years.

sdata.j: ↑有意義↑↓ゆういぎ↓な↑回答↑↓かいとう↓とは、↑新↑↓あら↓たな↑疑問↑↓ぎもん↓を↑生↑↓う↓むようなそれである。
sdata.e: The only useful answers are those that raise new questions.

sdata.j: そのことを↑後悔↑↓こうかい↓しながら↑余生↑↓よせい↓を↑送↑↓おく↓りたくない。
sdata.e: I don't want to spend the rest of my life regretting it.

sdata.j: ↑想像↑↓そうぞう↓↑力↑↓りょく↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓のどの↑側面↑↓そくめん↓にも↑影響↑↓えいきょう↓を↑与↑↓あた↓える。
sdata.e: Imagination affects every aspect of our lives.

sdata.j: テレビがなかったら↑生↑↓い↓きていけないよ。
sdata.e: I can't live without a TV.

sdata.j: ↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑目的↑↓もくてき↓なく↑人生↑↓じんせい↓を↑漂↑↓ただよ↓う。
sdata.e: Many people drift through life without a purpose.

sdata.j: ↑愛↑↓あい↓のない↑人生↑↓じんせい↓など↑全↑↓まった↓く↑無意味↑↓むいみ↓だ。
sdata.e: Life without love is just totally pointless.

sdata.j: ↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓↑費↑↓ひ↓が↑断然↑↓だんぜん↓↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
sdata.e: The cost of life increased drastically.

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓とは、↑他↑↓た↓の↑予定↑↓よてい↓を↑立↑↓た↓てることに↑忙↑↓いそが↓しくしている↑時↑↓とき↓に↑起↑↓お↓こる↑現象↑↓げんしょう↓のことだ。
sdata.e: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓で↑人生↑↓じんせい↓はこんなに↑苦悩↑↓くのう↓でいっぱいなんだ？
sdata.e: Why is life so full of suffering?

sdata.j: ↑情熱↑↓じょうねつ↓は↑苦悩↑↓くのう↓を↑生↑↓う↓む。
sdata.e: Passion creates suffering.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓に↑贈↑↓おく↓り↑物↑↓もの↓をあげたいんです。
sdata.e: I would like to give him a present for his birthday.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓にプレゼントを↑贈↑↓おく↓りたいんです。
sdata.e: I would like to give him a present for his birthday.

sdata.j: あの↑日↑↓ひ↓が↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓で↑最高↑↓さいこう↓の↑日↑↓ひ↓だった。
sdata.e: That was the best day of my life.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑六↑↓ろく↓↑歳↑↓さい↓のときタイプライターの↑使↑↓つか↓い↑方↑↓かた↓を↑学↑↓まな↓び、↑手↑↓て↓で↑書↑↓か↓くことを↑学↑↓まな↓ぶ↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓などないと↑先生↑↓せんせい↓に↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: At the age of six he had learned to use the typewriter and told the teacher that he did not need to learn to write by hand.
